Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    akka.stream.actor.ActorPublisher
    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.
    akka.stream.actor.ActorSubscriber
    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.
    akka.contrib.pattern.Aggregator
    Feel free to copy. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.camel.Consumer
    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.jul.JavaLogging
    Feel free to copy. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.jul.JavaLoggingAdapter
    Feel free to copy. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.camel.Oneway
    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.
    akka.camel.Producer
    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.pattern.ReceivePipeline
    Feel free to copy. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.remote.transport.netty.UdpHandlers
    Deprecated in favour of Artery (the new Aeron/UDP based remoting implementation). Since 2.5.0.
    akka.actor.UntypedActorContext
    Use AbstractActor.ActorContext instead of UntypedActorContext. Since 2.5.0.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    akka.stream.actor.AbstractActorPublisher
    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.
    akka.stream.actor.AbstractActorPublisher$
    Use `akka.stream.stage.GraphStage` instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.stream.actor.AbstractActorPublisherWithStash
    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.

    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.

    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.
    akka.stream.actor.AbstractActorSubscriber$
    Use akka.stream.stage.GraphStage instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant.
    akka.actor.ActorDSL
    Use the normal actorOf methods defined on ActorSystem and ActorContext to create Actors instead.
    akka.actor.ActorDSL$
    Use the normal actorOf methods defined on ActorSystem and ActorContext to create Actors instead.
    akka.stream.actor.ActorPublisher$
    Use `akka.stream.stage.GraphStage` instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.stream.actor.ActorSubscriber$
    Use `akka.stream.stage.GraphStage` instead, it allows for all operations an Actor would and is more type-safe as well as guaranteed to be ReactiveStreams compliant. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.agent.Agent
    Agents are deprecated and scheduled for removal in the next major version, use Actors instead.
    akka.agent.Agent$
    Agents are deprecated and scheduled for removal in the next major version, use Actors instead. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.circuitbreaker.AskeableWithCircuitBreakerActor
    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.

    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.

    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.circuitbreaker.AskeableWithCircuitBreakerActorSelection$
    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.dispatch.BalancingDispatcher
    Use BalancingPool instead of BalancingDispatcher. Since 2.3.
    akka.testkit.CachingPartialFunction
    The only usage is in JavaTestKit which is deprecated. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.camel.CamelMessage
    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.

    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.

    akka.camel.Consumer$
    Akka Camel is deprecated in favour of 'Alpakka', the Akka Streams based collection of integrations to various endpoints (including Camel). Since 2.5.0.
    akka.remote.security.provider.DeprecatedAES128CounterSecureRNG
    Use SecureRandom instead. We cannot prove that this code is correct, see https://doc.akka.io/docs/akka/current/security/2018-08-29-aes-rng.html. Since 2.5.16.
    akka.remote.security.provider.DeprecatedAES256CounterSecureRNG
    Use SecureRandom instead. We cannot prove that this code is correct, see https://doc.akka.io/docs/akka/current/security/2018-08-29-aes-rng.html. Since 2.5.16.
    akka.remote.security.provider.DeprecatedAkkaProvider
    Use SecureRandom instead. We cannot prove that this code is correct, see https://doc.akka.io/docs/akka/current/security/2018-08-29-aes-rng.html. Since 2.5.16.
    akka.remote.security.provider.DeprecatedAkkaProvider$
    Use SecureRandom instead. We cannot prove that this code is correct, see https://doc.akka.io/docs/akka/current/security/2018-08-29-aes-rng.html. Since 2.5.16.
    akka.actor.ExtensionKey
    Use a regular Extension instead. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.stream.FanInShape1N
    FanInShape1N was removed because it was not used anywhere. Use a custom shape extending from FanInShape directly. Since 2.5.5.
    akka.contrib.circuitbreaker.Implicits
    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.
    akka.contrib.circuitbreaker.Implicits$
    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.

    Do not use this directly, use subclasses of this. Since 2.0.

    Do not use this directly, use subclasses of this. Since 2.0.

    Do not use this directly, use 'Recover'. Since 2.0.
    akka.dispatch.japi.UnitFunctionBridge
    Do not use this directly, use subclasses of this. Since 2.0.

    Use TestKit instead, since 2.5.0

  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    akka.stream.BindFailedException$
    BindFailedException object will never be thrown. Match on the class instead. Since .
    akka.contrib.circuitbreaker.OpenCircuitException
    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.

    Use akka.pattern.CircuitBreaker + ask instead. Since 2.5.0.

    akka.stream.scaladsl.Sink$.foreachParallel(int, Function1<T, BoxedUnit>, ExecutionContext)
    Use `foreachAsync` instead, it allows you to choose how to run the procedure, by calling some other API returning a Future or spawning a new Future. Since 2.5.17.

    Use `foreachAsync` instead, it allows you to choose how to run the procedure, by calling some other API returning a CompletionStage or using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync. Since 2.5.17.

    Use `foreachAsync` instead, it allows you to choose how to run the procedure, by calling some other API returning a CompletionStage or using CompletableFuture.supplyAsync. Since 2.5.17.

    akka.persistence.fsm.PersistentFSM.State.using(D)
    Internal API easily to be confused with regular FSM's using. Use regular events (`applying`). Internally, `copy` can be used instead. Since 2.5.5.
    akka.stream.ActorMaterializerSettings.withAutoFusing(boolean)
    Turning off fusing is no longer possible with the traversal based materializer. Since 2.5.0.
